thread.title: #Initiative55 rally, march in support of #MSflag change this Sunday
thread.title_full: #Initiative55 rally, march in support of #MSflag change this Sunday

author: Frank Corder
title: #Initiative55 rally, march in support of #MSflag change this Sunday
text: Rally and march over state flag planned for Jackson A South Carolina state representative, rapper David Banner and civil rights activist Myrlie Evers-Williams are scheduled to lead a march and rally on Sunday in support of Initiative No. 55 to remove the Confederate battle emblem from the Mississippi state flag. The march is planned to begin at 1:30 p.m. at the intersection of J.R. Lynch and Rose streets and end at the steps on the south side of the state Capitol, where a rally will last from 3:40 p.m. to 5 p.m. ClarionLedger Posted October 7, 2015 - 5:04 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
